T01n895u_001:7: bhaktebhyo varade devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 1 ||
T01n895u_001:12: siddhānāṃ pūjite devi trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 3 ||
T01n895u_001:14: ugratāre namo nityaṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 4 ||
T01n895u_001:21: snāne dāne tathā jāpye balidāne tathā kratau |
T01n895u_001:22: prasthāne ca na śakto'haṃ trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 8 ||
T01n895u_001:24: tvāṃ vinā na gatiryasya trāhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam || 9 ||
T01n895u_001:28: devīṃ sampūjya yatnena labhate vāñchitaṃ phalam || 11 ||
T01n895u_001:29: aṣṭamyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ navamyāṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ |
T01n895u_001:31: mokṣārthī labhate mokṣaṃ dhanārthī labhate dhanam |
T01n895u_001:33: idaṃ stotraṃ paṭhitvā tu saṃgrāme praviśennaraḥ |
T01n895u_001:34: tasya śatruḥ kṣayaṃ yāti sadā prajñā prajāyate || 14 ||
T01n895u_001:36: ya idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ śubhaṃ tasya na saṃśayaḥ || 15 ||
